title: Facebook Ads Specialist
job_overview:
Facebook Media Buyer Wanted – $600/month + Performance Bonuses

We’re looking for a skilled and reliable Facebook Media Buyer to join our team!

What you’ll do:
 – Run and scale conversion-focused Facebook & Instagram ads (no lead gen)
 – Work closely with our creative team to test and optimize ad creatives
 – Analyze performance data and make fast, smart decisions to improve ROAS

Compensation:
 – $600/month base - 2-3x Hours a Day 
 – Performance-based bonuses (Up to 200$ a month) 
 – Remote – Work from anywhere
 – Flexible hours – We only care about performance
 – Long-term position – We’re looking for someone to grow with us

Important:
 We’re looking for someone who knows how to keep things simple and scale profitably using the 1 Campaign Strategy on Facebook Ads.
(Note: If you just send a CV or a long ChatGPT-style message, you’ll be skipped automatically. Read carefully and only include what’s necessary. )



If you're serious, message my assistant on WhatsApp: Upgrade to see actual info)

What we’re looking for:
 – You’ve worked with eCommerce brands before
 – You know exactly how the 1 Campaign Strategy works (and why)
 – You’ve got recent proof that you can deliver results (past 30 days)
 – You’re comfortable working with strong creatives and testing fast
 – You focus on quality over quantity in campaigns

To apply:
 – Tell us what the 1 Campaign Strategy is
 – Show us results from the last 30 days (screenshots or breakdowns)
 – Let us know your rate and how soon you can start

Looking forward to seeing your work. Let’s scale something great.
